translations: adv.逻辑地，运筹地；在后勤方面

sentences.sentence: Logistically it is very difficult to value unit-linked policies.
sentences.translation: 在组织上很难重视基金连锁政策。

sentences.sentence: Some women find breast-feeding logistically difficult because of work.
sentences.translation: 因为工作，有些妇女感到母乳喂养在安排上有困难。

sentences.sentence: It is about time that the U.N. considers logistically deploying additional military resources.
sentences.translation: 联合国到了该考虑有组织地部署额外军事资源的时候了。
